mapper.select: SELECT r.idx AS reservation_idx, r.check_in_date, r.check_out_date, DATE_FORMAT(r.reservation_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reservation_date, r.payment_status, r.price , rm.room_type , u.idx AS user_idx, u.name AS user_name, u.phone AS user_phone, u.email AS user_email , p.idx AS pertner_idx, p.email AS pertner_email, p.name AS pertner_name, p.type AS pertner_type, p.phone AS pertner_phone, p.address AS pertner_address FROM RESERVATION r JOIN ROOM rm ON (r.room_idx = rm.idx) JOIN USER u ON (r.user_idx = u.idx) JOIN PARTNER p ON (r.partner_idx = p.idx) WHERE r.idx = #{reservation_idx}
